sn29.9:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn29.9:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana samsedajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti?
sn29.9:1.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayam paccayo, yena midhekacco kayassa bheda param marana samsedajanam naganam sahabyatam upapajjati”ti.
